About eversoul

Eversoul is your friendly Neocities web portal, inspired by old web portals from the 2000s like MSN, AOL, Yahoo, and others.

The Creator

My name is ReduxFlakes and I'm the founder of eversoul. I'm an open source Android app developer, web developer, app translator, and designer.
